entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who acquired something recently. He is described as someone who came to fetch Harry from his aunt and uncle's place.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one being fetched by Dumbledore. He is also referred to as 'sir' by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore acquired something recently, around the time he came to fetch Harry from his aunt and uncle's place.
